# f5distributedcloud_network_firewall (Resource)

The `f5distributedcloud_network_firewall` resource manages Network Firewalls in F5 Distributed Cloud.

Network Firewalls provide network-level security controls.

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "f5distributedcloud_network_firewall" "example" {
  name        = "my-network-firewall"
  namespace   = "system"
  description = "Network firewall for perimeter security"
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)

### Optional

- `description` (String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
